channel.title: 317 client closes
channel.description:
ok when ever i run any server on any client i always get an error like this:
# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d84a2e6, pid=5912, tid=5956 # # JRE version: 6.0_18-b05 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (16.0-b12 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x5a2e6] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #

item.title: 317 client closes
item.dc:creator: @moparscape5399 moparscape5399
item.description:
@moparscape5399 wrote:

ok when ever i run any server on any client i always get an error like this:
